text: The Fugitive is a 1910 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe FugitiveTHE FUGITIVE and stars Kate Bruce, Edward Dillon, and Clara T. Bracy. ==Actors== * Kate Bruce as Confederate Mother * Edward Dillon as John, Confederate Son * Clara T. Bracy as Union Mother * Edwin August as John, Union Son * Dorothy West as Confederate Son's Fiancée * Lucy Cotton as Union Son's Fiancée * Jack Mulhall as New Boy Friend ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Fugitive (1910 movie)
